eg.projects

Class HtmlActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.projects.ProjectConfig
      • eg.projects.HtmlActions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable, ProjectActions

    public final class HtmlActions
extends ProjectConfig
implements ProjectActions
    Represents a project to write a webpage in HTML
